You can drag items up or down the list using thebutton.

What the item action is. The following actions are available:open web page / download a filesend emailmake callsend SMSopen internal linkThe exact parameters depend on the selected action. To use an internal link to an element, enable the block identifier in the setup area of the corresponding element.
Whether to use regular or bold font.
How large the form text is.
Color of the normal text, for example, separator. You can specify a hex code or select from a color palette.
Color of the linked text. You can specify a hex code or select from a color palette.
How to arrange the menu items.
What characters to display between menu items.
Whether to use an expandable menu tailored for better mobile UX in mobile view.
Distance between the menu items and the element border.
Whether to hide the element on desktop or mobile view.
Whether to enable a unique element ID required for internal linking as well as low-code customization.
html:
Parameter

Functionality

Add new item

Adds an item to the menu. This enables the Configure menu item parameter group.

Configure menu item

You can drag items up or down the list using the button.

Text

Caption of the menu item.

Link type

What the item action is. The following actions are available:

  • open web page / download a file
  • send email
  • make call
  • send SMS
  • open internal link

The exact parameters depend on the selected action. To use an internal link to an element, enable the block identifier in the setup area of the corresponding element.

Font family

Font type.

Font weight

Whether to use regular or bold font.

Font size

How large the form text is.

Text color

Color of the normal text, for example, separator. You can specify a hex code or select from a color palette.

Link color

Color of the linked text. You can specify a hex code or select from a color palette.

Align

How to align the menu.

Letter spacing

Distance between the letters.

Layout

How to arrange the menu items.

Separator

What characters to display between menu items.

Mobile menu

Whether to use an expandable menu tailored for better mobile UX in mobile view.

Items padding

Distance between the menu items.

Padding

Distance between the menu items and the element border.

Hide on

Whether to hide the element on desktop or mobile view.

Block identifier

Whether to enable a unique element ID required for internal linking as well as low-code customization.
